text.text_translated: Julie Wong is an important researcher in the area of Robotics and AI. She has written or helped to write more than 50 papers. These papers are for important science magazines. She often speaks at international meetings for experts. In 2012, she won a special award for researchers. It was called the Royal Academy Simone Fielding fellowship. Julie lives with her family in a smart home that she designed herself.

feedback.feedback: PASS. The text adheres perfectly to B1 standards. Sentences are short and clear. Complex concepts like 'peer-reviewed journals' and 'fellowship' are simplified effectively into 'important science magazines' and 'a special award for researchers'. Factual accuracy is maintained. No violations found.
